s1.name: Download
s1.subtitle: ASM Stable Releases
s1.p: ASM stable releases can be downloaded from the ObjectWeb Forge.
s1.subtitle: ASM CVS Repository
s1.p: You can also download ASM from the ObjectWeb Forge CVS.

ul.li: .: used to get the whole ASM repository.
web: used to get the ASM web site.

s1.p: Note that the latest snapshot of the CVS repository is available for download. This snapshot is generated each night at 00:00 AM CEST.
